00020 
00021 inline BOOLEAN IsTpduSentStatus(UINT8 status)
00022 {
00023     return (status & 0x07) == 0x05;
00024 }   
00025 
00027 
00028 inline UINT8 GetRawTpduStatus(UINT8 status)
00029 {
00030     return (status & 0x07);
00031 }   
00032 
00033 /*  ========================================================================
00034     TPDU: Transfer Protocol Data Unit - 3GPP TS 23.040 V5.1.0 [9]
00035     ======================================================================== */
00038 class Tpdu : public Linkable<Tpdu> {
00039     typedef Linkable<Tpdu> Base;
00040     public:
00042         enum Status {
00044             Empty           = SI_SM_STATUS_FREE,            // = 0000 0000
00046             Read            = SI_SM_STATUS_READ,            // = 0000 0001
00048             Unread          = SI_SM_STATUS_TO_BE_READ,      // = 0000 0011
00050             Sent            = SI_SM_STATUS_SENT,            // = 0000 0101 SMS sent
00052             SentSmsrReq     = 0x0d,                         // = 0000 1101 SMS sent and report requested
00054             SentSmsrNoSmsr  = 0x15,                         // = 0001 0101 SMS sent, report not stored in SMSR
00056             SentSmsrInSmsr  = 0x1d,                         // = 0001 1101 SMS sent, report stored in SMSR
00058             Unsent          = SI_SM_STATUS_TO_BE_SENT,      // = 0000 0111
00060             UndefinedStatus = SI_SM_STATUS_UNKNOWN          // = 1111 1111
00061         };
00062 
00064         Tpdu();
00066         Tpdu(Status status, INT length = 0, const UINT8 *data = 0);
00068         Tpdu(const T_PDU &sdl_pdu);
00070         virtual ~Tpdu();
00072         Tpdu(const Tpdu &tpdu);
00074         Tpdu& operator =(const Tpdu &tpdu);
00076         BOOLEAN operator == (const Tpdu &tpdu) const;
00077 
00079         void Convert2Pdu(T_PDU &sdl_pdu) const;
00080 
00082         BOOLEAN IsValid() const;
00083 
00085         void SetStatus(Status status) { m_status = status; }
00087         void SetDataBuffer(INT length, const UINT8 *data);
00088         
00090         Status GetStatus() const { return (m_status); }
00092         INT GetLength() const { return (m_length); }
00094         UINT8* GetData() const { return (m_data); }
00095 
00097         PhoneNumber GetServiceCentreAddress() const;
00099         void SetServiceCentreAddress(const PhoneNumber &phone_number);
00100 
00102         MessageTypeIndicator GetMessageTypeIndicator() const;
00103 
00105         BOOLEAN IsMobileTerminated() const { return (m_status == Read || m_status == Unread); }
00107         BOOLEAN IsMobileOriginated() const { return (IsTpduSentStatus(m_status) || m_status == Unsent); }
00108 
00109 
00111         static INT GetMaxDataSize();
00112 
00114         INT GetTpOffset() const;
00115 
00116         // returns the anchor of the real TPDU-data (starting with message type indicator). 
00117         INT GetTpLength() const;
00118 
00119         // returns the anchor of the real TPDU-data (starting with message type indicator). 
00120         UINT8* GetTpData() const;
00121 
00122 
00124         INT ReallocateData(INT length);
00125 
00127         INT ResizeData(INT length);
00128 
00130         void CopyData(const UINT8 *data);
00131 
00133         void ClearData();
00134 
00136         void Clear();
00137 
00139         void InitData(UINT8 fill_byte = 0x00);
00140 
00141     private:
00142         Status m_status;
00143         INT m_length;
00144         UINT8 *m_data;
00145 };
